I don t like feeling obligated to hang out with someone.
I can tell right away if i m going to like someone.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
Hello, I am doing well. How about you?
I am doing good as well. Thanks for asking.
You're welcome. So, what do you do for a living?
I am a mortician.
Oh, that's interesting. I've never met a mortician before.
It's a pretty interesting job, but it can be tough at times.
I bet. Do you have any funny stories from your time as a mortician?

Sure, I have a few. One time, I was embalming a body and the family came in to say goodbye. The body was not as stiff as I thought it would be, so when the family member went to kiss the forehead, the head fell off.
Oh my gosh, that's terrible!
Yeah, it was pretty funny though.
I'm sure it was! So, what are some of your hobbies?
I like to collect stamps, I want to learn how to fly an airplane, and my favorite movie is Dirty Harry.
Those are all interesting hobbies. I've never collected stamps, but I love flying. I've been a pilot for 10 years.
That's awesome! I'm jealous. I've always wanted to learn how to fly, but I've never had the time or money.
You should definitely try it sometime. It's a lot of fun.
I will, thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, I love sunny days, and I love coffee.
Those are all great things. I like going to the movies too, but I'm not a big fan of sunny days. I prefer rainy days.
I love rainy days too! I think they're so relaxing.
Me too! So, what do you like to do on rainy days?
I like to stay inside and watch movies, or I like to go for walks in the rain.
Those are both great things to do on a rainy day.
